passage_text: COST FACTOR... So, your daily feed for the care of one healthy 1100 lb. horse will average between .75 and $4.80 per day for grain and will be around $4.40 per day for hay. That total is $4.40 to $8.80 per day. Multiply by 30 days per month, and your average cost to feed a healthy 15H horse is a minimum o f $132.00 and can easily go as high as $264.00. That cost can increase easily depending on the amount of work your horse is in, as well as its breed. Thoroughbreds, for example, are known to need a much higher amount of feed in relation to their body weight than the average Quarter horse.
